item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Frosted Glass from Games to the Web: HTML glass UI inspired by AAA game dev (372 points | 76 comments)
2. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (260 points | 175 comments)
3. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (238 points | 76 comments)
4. Which Power Plant Does My Electricity Come From? (61 points | 20 comments)
5. How to give a senior leader feedback without getting fired (250 points | 208 comments)
6. A 132-Year-Old Message in a Bottle in a Scottish Lighthouse (22 points | 9 comments)
7. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring Operations Coordinator ( | hide)
8. Foursquare's 104M Points of Interest (57 points | 19 comments)
9. Minecraft enters real world with $110M global theme park deal (34 points | 16 comments)
10. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (443 points | 119 comments)
11. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (206 points | 29 comments)
12. 32k context length text embedding models (55 points | 18 comments)
13. Three hundred words you can spell on a calculator [pdf] (54 points | 18 comments)
14. Supreme Court allows multibillion-dollar class action to proceed against Meta (94 points | 40 comments)
15. Undersea Cables Connect the Global Internet (6 points | 1 comment)
16. Continuous Integration Dashboard for Apache NuttX RTOS (Prometheus and Grafana) (61 points | 1 comment)
17. 1 Dataset. 100 Visualizations (130 points | 42 comments)
18. A century later, a taped message solves the mystery of a WWI doughboy's death (59 points | 30 comments)
19. Robot Jailbreak: Researchers Trick Bots into Dangerous Tasks (23 points | 3 comments)
20. Homeless people to be given cash in first major UK trial to reduce poverty (20 points | 38 comments)
21. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (101 points | 43 comments)
22. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (173 points | 26 comments)
23. Stack Analyser: detect technologies used inside a repo (46 points | 6 comments)
24. Microsoft will soon let you clone your voice for Teams meetings (36 points | 16 comments)
25. Ice base melt revealed by multibeam imagery of an Antarctic ice shelf (91 points | 3 comments)
26. The remarkable life and astonishing times of Dwight Smith Young (36 points | 2 comments)
27. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (300 points | 75 comments)
28. Firefox DevTools Network Tab: How to filter requests by properties (53 points | 4 comments)
29. A short introduction to Interval Tree Clocks (2017) (67 points | 19 comments)
30. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (146 points | 36 comments)
